altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

altTitles.pl: Anioł z sąsiedztwa niezwykle mnie rozpieszcza

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.ja: ファンタジスタ

description.en: Teppei Sakamoto is a boy living in the countryside. He loves soccer, and all his soccer skills were taught to him by his sister. Finally, his sister wants him to join the Mizumoto High School soccer team. Teppei's turn in life has come!! How will this soccer newbie fare in his new environment?

altTitles.ja: フールナイト

description.en:
In the distant future, earth is covered by thick clouds and deprived of the warm rays of sunlight. Natural plants have all but withered, leading to low levels of oxygen everywhere. 

However, humans have developed a technique to transform people into plants to produce a small amount of oxygen that allows mankind to keep surviving. In this world, everyone must decide: Will they live as humans in a bleak and uncertain world, or abandon their anguish to embrace a new life as plants?
___
[Alt Official English (Shougakukan Asia)](https://shogakukan.asia/fool-night/)
description.ru:
Продолжать прикладывать усилия ради жизни человеком? Или же красиво осыпаться, подобно цветку? Душевно изображенный неизвестный мир будущего!

Мир далёкого будущего окружают облака, не пропускающие дневной свет, увядших растений и недостатка кислорода. Однако, люди разработали технологию превращения человека в растение для получения кислорода и продолжают выживать.
Перед людьми встаёт нелёгкий выбор - продолжать выживать в этом безнадежном мире людей или же, отбросив страдания, сделать шаг в новую жизнь в виде растений?
description.vi: Trong tương lai, trái đất bị các đám mây đen che phủ. Không còn ánh sáng mặt trời, thực vật chết dần, lượng oxi tụt giảm mạnh. Tuy nhiên, con người đã tìm ra thứ công nghệ "biến người thành thực vật" để sản xuất thêm lượng oxi ít ỏi giúp con người sống sót.

title.en: I Failed to Divorce My Husband

altTitles.ko: 흑막 남편과의 이혼에 실패한 것 같다

altTitles.ko-ro: Heungmang Nampyeongwaui Ihone Silpaehan Geon Gatda

altTitles.en: I Am Afraid I Have Failed to Divorce My Husband

altTitles.fr: Je n'ai pas réussi à divorcer de mon (vilain) mari

altTitles.pt: Falhei em me divorciar do meu esposo

altTitles.ja: 黒幕夫に惚れられました

description.en:
I've been reincarnated as the extra character who stalked her husband, the male lead, for 10 years and died. Of course, I tried to divorce him before the female lead appeared.

But, I found out that my young husband was secretly abused in the house. At that moment, I immediately became overwhelmed with the responsibility and sense of duty a modern adult would have. 

**

Aiden had his back turned away from her and suddenly grabbed her arm forcefully. The strength of his hands alone could have ripped her arms off. Erin timidly called his name and spoke. 

"I already reminded you yesterday. We're a married couple, so I'm always on your side." 

"..."

"So, everything is alright." 

She comforted him with these sweet words like it was a spell. And as if he was under her magic, Aiden stopped trembling. 

**

The adult Erin requested to divorce her husband Aiden before the female lead appeared. As soon as those words left her lips, Aiden's smile disappeared. 

"A divorce? Never."

Aiden tore the divorce papers into such thin sheets, the contents were no longer legible. Erin smiled at the sight. (Synopsis source: Gourmet Scans)

---
Ellen's plan is simple. Before turning into an obsessive villain who gets executed, she's going to get a divorce! But after she becomes Ellen Lianster, her plan gets complicated. Her new husband, Aiden, has developed a debilitating fear of being touched, and Ellen is determined to discover the cause and cure. As she finds ways to help him, an affection-deprived Aiden slowly begins to seek comfort from Ellen. With both hearts opening up to each other, can this marriage succeed... at failing?
description.fr: J'ai été réincarnée en tant que la figurante qui a harcelé son mari, le rôle masculin principal, pendant 10 ans et qui est morte. Bien sûr, j'ai essayé de divorcer avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Mais j'ai découvert que la nounou de mon jeune mari abusait secrètement de lui. À ce moment-là, j'ai immédiatement été submergée par la responsabilité et le sens du devoir d'un adulte moderne. *** Aiden, qui lui tournait le dos, lui a soudainement saisi le bras avec force. La seule force de ses mains aurait pu lui arracher les bras. Erin l'appela timidement et prit la parole. «Je te l'ai déjà rappelé hier. Nous sommes un couple marié, alors je suis toujours de ton côté.» «...» «Alors, tout va bien.» Elle le réconforta avec ces mots doux comme s'il s'agissait d'un sortilège. Et comme s'il était sous sa magie, Aiden cessa de trembler. *** Erin, adulte, a demandé le divorce à son mari Aiden avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Dès que ces mots ont quitté ses lèvres, le sourire d'Aiden a disparu. «Un divorce? Jamais.» Aiden a déchiré les papiers du divorce en feuilles si fines que le contenu n'était plus lisible. Erin sourit à cette vue.
description.zh: 漫画简介: 社牛打工人穿成会被疯批男主处死的小恶女，却意外发现10岁的男主是个缺爱小可怜。每天糯叽叽黏人的正太小乖乖，在小恶女的养成下，还会成为腹黑疯批吗？

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン・ユナイタル・リング

description.en: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
description.es-la: Ha pasado un año desde el regreso de Kirito y Asuna del Underworld. Con ellos está Alice, que ha recibido un cuerpo físico. Pero su paz se rompe rápidamente cuando los tres se ven empujados de repente a un juego desconocido, Unital Ring. Este nuevo mundo es un MMO de supervivencia que fusiona todos los VRMMO creados con el programa "The Seed". Nada más empezar, Kirito se encuentra sin nada más que su ropa interior. Ahora, ¡Tiene que desafiar a un misterioso VRMMOSVG en circunstancias desesperadas!

altTitles.ja: テニスの王子様

description.en:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

description.en: It's a secret that I'm dating the love of my life at school. There's no way I can tell anyone, especially when we're both girls. But I can't help my feelings from slipping out in the background. It's not the ideal way to be a couple, but I can put up with it because I really love her... But such loneliness has also nurtured dark thoughts in my head.
description.th:
ผลงานมังงะเรื่องใหม่ของ อ.อิวามิ คิโยโกะ ผู้เขียน "Luminous = Blue"
โลกความเป็นจริงกับโลกออนไลน์ สิ่งที่เปิดเผยให้คนอื่นรู้ได้กับสิ่งที่ต้องการปิดเป็นความลับจากคนรอบข้าง ใครหลายคนอาจมีโลกสองฝั่งแบบนี้อยู่เหมือนกัน

description.en:
Have you ever skipped studying to play video games? Unfortunately for high school senior Yushin Lee, the stakes are a little higher than flunking, as he finds himself trapped in a VR-based MMORPG. 

Yushin was selected to beta test the game, only to be forced to fight for his life in a seemingly endless loop. What was supposed to be a light distraction from the stress of high-school life becomes a desperate struggle for survival as Yushin battles his way through REAL Online, a dark fantasy world created by a mysterious tech company with uncertain motives.

---

Ли Ю Шин отправился насладиться новой игрой в VR.
Но это была не просто игра... 
Это был игровой мир, где передача ощущений из реальности переваливала за 100%!

Um mundo de jogo onde tudo parece assustadoramente real -No ciclo interminável de morte e ressurreição, onde o logout não é permitido, Yooshin se prepara para lutar. Para escapar do campo de batalha infernal do qual não há escapatória…

altTitles.de: Die Prinzessin prägt ein dem Rebellen

altTitles.es-la: La princesa se obsesiona con el traidor

altTitles.ja: 皇女、反逆者に刻印する

description.en:
After the fall of the empire due to the homunculi, Evienrose, the 7th Princess, dies after drinking poison given by her younger sister who has taken their side. When she opens her eyes again, she has returned 8 years to the past. To stop the fall of the imperial family, Eve decides to turn 'Mikhael', the leader of the homunculi and the 'Monster of the Floating Prison', into her appointed knight.

"Mikhael, I need you, very much."

---
Princess Evienrose, despite advocating fiercely for the rights of the homunculi rebels, now awaits death at their hands… that is until she is poisoned by her own sister! Awakening eight years in the past, Eve now has one goal: become the Empress and liberate the homunculi to stop the rebellion from ever happening! To do this, she appoints the rebel king himself, Mikaelis Agnito, as her personal knight. But with Eve’s scheming sisters standing in the way, the fight for the crown is on, and the fate of the Hadelamid empire rests in her hands!

---
The seventh imperial princess, Evenrose, once died. Her last memory was of the royal family was destroyed by the Homunculus, the rebelling slaves, and of her sister who had sided with the rebels and urged her to escape her painful execution by swallowing poison. But when she opened her eyes again, "I...I'm not dead." She realizes that she had gone eight years back in time, back to a time before her cruel sister Bridgette was chosen as the next emperor. Given the opportunity to prevent the fall of the imperial family by being chosen as the next emperor herself, she decides to write her own article about Michael, the king of Homunculus and the monster of public prison, in order to win the emperor's heart. "I need you, Michael. Very badly." Will Evenrose be able to get him and protect the imperial family safely?

---

description.es:
La séptima princesa imperial, Evenrose, murió una vez.Su último recuerdo fue cuando la familia real fue destruida por el Homúnculo, quien provocó la traición y se ahogó en el plan de su hermano parado de su lado, al tragar veneno. Pero cuando volvió a abrir los ojos,"Yo ... no estoy muerto."Se da cuenta de que ha vuelto al pasado y que era ocho años más joven. Fue antes de que el tercer emperador, que será el próximo heredero, fuera elegido oficialmente como sucesor. Una oportunidad para evitar la caída de la familia imperial presionando al tercer emperador Bridgette y siendo reconocida como sucesora. Como parte de la preparación, Evenrose decidió escribir su propio artículo sobre Michael, el rey de Homunculus y el monstruo de la prisión pública, para ganarse el corazón del emperador."Te necesito, Michael. Muy desesperadamente."¿Podrá Evenrose atraparlo y proteger a la familia imperial de manera segura?

---

description.fr:
Il était une fois, un royaume où grâce à une alchimie interdite, des homonculus étaient créés.

Ces homonculus devaient se soumettre à la volonté de la famille Impériale à l’aide d’une magie d’asservissement. Les plus doués d’entre eux faisaient partie de la garde du château et parmi eux, la famille Impériale devait en choisir un pour en faire leur chevalier personnel. Mais un homonculus résista au sort de l’Empereur: Mikhaelis Agnito.

Il organisa une rébellion, souleva les homonculus contre l’empire et exécuta toute la famille Impériale à l’exception de la 7ᵉ princesse, Evenrose et la 8ᵉ princesse, Rosenite. Cette dernière, éperdument amoureuse de Mikhaelis, croyait qu’elle portait en elle le «résultat de leur amour.» Elle pensait être exceptionnelle mais elle n’était en vie qu’uniquement parce qu’elle avait subit une expérience avec la pierre philosophale, qui ne fonctionnait seulement qu’avec le sang royal. Une simple marionnette que Mikhaelis pouvait contrôler à sa guise.

Cependant, le traître avait des sentiments pour Evenrose, car elle était différente. Elle était contre l’utilisation des homonculus comme esclaves et étudia durement pour leur rendre leur liberté, faisant d’elle le mouton noir de la famille Impériale. Malheureusement, elle ne comprit pas les actions de Mikhaelis et croyait qu’elle allait se faire exécuter comme les siens.
Rosenite en profita pour venir la voir et l’empoisonner, se réjouissant de la mort de sa demi-sœur, pensant avoir Mikhaelis pour elle seule. En apprenant la nouvelle de la mort d’Evenrose, Mikhaelis tente alors par tous les moyens de la ressusciter. Un mage lui proposa un moyen: celui de retourner dans le temps. Néanmoins, seule Evenrose gardera les souvenirs de tout ce qui c’était passé jusqu’à présent. Mikhaelis accepta sans sourciller, du moment que sa bien aimée était en vie. Quand le sort se lança, Evenrose ouvrit les yeux et se retrouva 8 ans en arrière.

Sera-t-elle capable de changer son destin?

---

description.id:
Putri kekaisaran ketujuh, Evenrose, pernah meninggal. Kenangan terakhirnya adalah tentang keluarga kerajaan yang dihancurkan oleh Homunculus, para budak yang memberontak, dan tentang saudara perempuannya yang telah memihak para pemberontak dan mendesaknya untuk melarikan diri dari eksekusi menyakitkannya dengan menelan racun. Tapi ketika dia membuka matanya lagi, "Aku... aku tidak mati." Dia menyadari bahwa dia telah pergi delapan tahun yang lalu, kembali ke masa sebelum saudara perempuannya yang kejam, Bridgette, dipilih sebagai kaisar berikutnya. Diberi kesempatan untuk mencegah jatuhnya keluarga kekaisaran dengan dipilih sendiri sebagai kaisar berikutnya, dia memutuskan untuk menulis artikelnya sendiri tentang Michael, raja Homunculus dan monster penjara umum, untuk memenangkan hati kaisar. "Aku membutuhkanmu, Michael. Sangat buruk." Akankah Evenrose bisa mendapatkannya dan melindungi keluarga kekaisaran dengan aman?

---

description.it:
La settima principessa imperiale, Evienrose, una volta morì e l'ultima cosa che ricorda fu quando la famiglia reale venne distrutta dagli Homunculi, e il tradimento della sorellina. Ma quando riaprì gli occhi si rende conto di essere tornata nel passato e di avere otto anni in meno, e ha così l'opportunità di impedire la caduta della famiglia imperiale incalzando il terzo imperatore Bridgette e facendosi riconoscere come successore. Come parte del piano, Evienrose ha deciso di avere dalla sua parte Mikhaelis Agnito, il futuro re degli Homunculus. "Ho bisogno di te, Mikhaelis." Riuscirà Evienrose a riuscirci e a proteggere la famiglia imperiale?

description.ja:
人造人間「ホムンクルス」の反乱によって滅びたハーデルラミド皇室。第7皇女イヴは妹の裏切りによって１度は命を落としたものの、錬金術の力で８年前の世界で再び目を覚ます。 イヴが皇室滅亡の未来を変えるための方法―それは皇室を滅亡に追い込んだホムンクルスの王・ミカエルを自らの専属騎士にすることだった。 皇女と反逆者、前世ではすれ違ってばかりだった２人が向かう未来とは——！

description.ko:
7황녀 이뷔엔로즈는 한 번 죽음을 맞이했다.그녀의 마지막 기억은 반역을 일으킨 호문클루스들에 의해 황실이 망하고그들의 편에 선 동생의 계략에 빠져 독약을 삼키고 죽었던 기억이었다. 그런데“나…… 안 죽었어……?”다시 눈을 떴을 때, 그녀는 자신이 8살이나 어려진 채 과거로 돌아왔다는 사실을 깨닫는다.그것도 다음 대 후계자가 되는 3황녀가 정식으로 후계자로 낙점되기 전으로.‘이건 기회야.’3황녀 브리지테를 누르고 후계자로 인정받아 황실의 몰락을 막을 기회.그 대비의 일환으로 이브는 황제의 마음을 얻고 자신의 가능성을 시험하기 위해호문클루스들의 왕이자 공중감옥의 괴물 ‘미카엘’을 자신의 기사로 들이기로 하는데.“미카엘 그대가 필요해. 아주 절실하게 말이야.”과연 이뷔엔로즈는 그를 얻고, 무사히 황실을 지켜낼 수 있을까.

После падения императорской семьи от рук гомункулов, седьмая принцесса Ивенроуз умирает, выпив яд, предложенный сестрой. description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...

description.en:
Whose feelings are simmering...?

When Masaki goes to college, he ends up staying with his cousin Haruomi, whom he admires and has a crush on. However, when he meets him again for the first time in several years, he has completely changed from the older brother he admired to a sloppy old man. He is shocked by his appearance, but he remains kind to Masaki, and his feelings for him grow stronger once again. However, no matter how hard Masaki tries to tell him how he feels, Haruomi stubbornly refuses.

"I love you."

Masaki is frustrated that he can't even accept his words, but he can sense that Haruomi is indecisive...

altTitles.en: Becoming the Queen at the Age of Six

description.en: I woke up to find myself transmigrated into a novel as the “background character that's doomed to die.” Now stuck in the body of a six-year-old, I’ve got some serious challenges ahead of me. But I’m not about to let fate have its way. Even if I have to become the villain, I’ll do whatever it takes to survive!

altTitles.en: If a Ghost Fell in Love for the First Time

altTitles.id: Jika Hantu Jatuh Cinta untuk Pertama Kalinya

description.id:
Aku Souta. Tidak punya pengalaman cinta, disebut sebagai otaku introvert dan siswa SMA… atau lebih tepatnya, dulu.
Hah? Kamu tanya apakah aku sudah lulus dari status virgin dan menjadi anak yang lebih keren?
Bukan, bukan. Aku bukan lagi seorang siswa SMA――aku sudah menjadi hantu.
Dengan kata lain, aku berubah menjadi mantan manusia yang introvert, otaku, dan virgn.
Aku hampir tidak punya ingatan ketika aku masih hidup, hanya satu hal yang masih aku ingat— yaitu aku masih virgin.
Mungkin itu adalah penyesalanku.
Dan entah bagaimana, aku tidak bisa keluar dari sekolah khusus cewek ini, jadi semacam arwah gentayangan yang terikat di sma putri ini, dan itu sungguh menyebalkan.
Tapi, meski saat hidup aku terlalu takut untuk bicara dengan cewek, sebagai hantu aku bisa bebas melihat mereka dalam segala situasi!
Aku mungkin merasa sedikit bersalah, tapi jadi hantu ternyata tidak buruk juga! Begitulah pikirku.
Hingga suatu hari, aku melihat boneka karakter favoritku terjatuh di sekolah. Saat mencoba mengambilnya――
“Kenapa ada cowok… di sekolah cewek ini…?”
Cantik, baik hati, populer dengan semua orang, dan entah bagaimana satu-satunya orang yang bisa melihatku walaupun aku adalah hantu dan benar-benar peduli padaku――
Aku jatuh cinta pada seorang gadis yang sama sekali tidak selevel denganku.

description.en:
Lisette, the daughter of an earl, is destined to be killed and eaten by a monster on her 20th birthday.
She is currently living her fourth life with all her memories intact.

In order to live longer this time, she goes to live in a sanctuary (the countryside) where monsters do not appear, but one day she reunites with Ralph, the handsome son of an aristocrat.

He is the young man whom Lisette saved when he was an orphan in her childhood.
The first words he says to her are, "I lived for you."

The first volume of a fantasy about a heroine who fights against her fate of death and a submissive, high-spec yandere hero, a devoted and doting love story!

description.en: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...

彼女を作ろうと意気込むDT（童貞）な大学１年生・友哉。同じサークルの癒やし系美少女・桜庭和歌と親しくなるものの、勇気が出ずなかなか第一歩を踏み出せずにいた。
そんなある日、友哉は和歌の「別の一面」を目撃してしまい…？

A noble <Hero> who punishes evil while under the protection of gods.
A demon born with tremendous demonic powers, is the last surviving <Demon King>.
And I’m an experienced third-rate <Villiain> that roams around the land.

I want my Villain’s life to be over.
I was going to retire and spend the rest of my life in comfort but the child I picked up by accident turned out to be the demon king and the hero is chasing me to "repay the favor".
My comfortable retirement years are ruined!

The 99 demons that guard the Villain ?
Prepare to die… Yes, may God bless you, now die!

신들의 가호를 받아 악을 처단하는 고결한 ‘영웅’.
악마의 힘을 받아 태어난 강력한 마족 최후의 생존자 ‘마왕’.

악당 생활도 이젠 끝이다. 은퇴해서 편안한 여생을 보내려 했더니
우연히 주운 녀석은 마왕이고, 영웅 녀석은 은혜를 갚겠답시고 찾아와

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

description.en: After being reincarnated to a year before her death, Bai Man's sole purpose in life is to kill the tyrannical emperor and take his place. To achieve her ultimate goal, she decides to seduce the formidable General Zhou Rong, a cold but beautiful woman. Who would have thought, however, that Zhou Rong is actually a crazy beauty?
description.pt-br: Depois de reencarnar um ano antes de sua morte, o único propósito de vida de Bai Man é matar o imperador tirano e tomar seu lugar. Para atingir seu objetivo final, ela decide seduzir o formidável General Zhou Rong, um homem frio, mas bonito. Quem teria pensado, entretanto, que Zhou Rong é na verdade uma mulher linda e maluca?

description.ja: 密かに思いを寄せ合っていた琴、あや、永理香の3人。琴の思いがあやに通じたのも束の間、あやは神隠しにあったかのように失踪してしまう。だが7年後、琴と永理香の前に、あやが当時の姿のままで現れて──。

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

description.en:
A romantic comedy about a cute housekeeper who takes care of Momokusa-san in various ways ♡

Shoji Hatakeki, an ordinary high school boy, ends up working part-time as a housekeeper at the house of Momokusa, the most beautiful girl in school!!
Momogusa-san is a perfect girl who is talented and talented in both literary and military arts, but at home she becomes a super lazy "Momogusa-san"!?
For some reason, Hatakeki has grown fond of her, and ends up taking care of Momokusa, who is unsuspectingly pampered at close range...!?
A romantic comedy about flirtatious housework with a lazy girl!!
description.vi: Chuyện tình chàng giúp việc và nàng lười!

altTitles.ja: 詭秘の主

description.en:
With the rising tide of steam power and machinery, who can come close to being a Beyonder? Shrouded in the fog of history and darkness, who or what is the lurking evil that murmurs into our ears?  
  
Waking up to be faced with a string of mysteries, Zhou Mingrui finds himself reincarnated as Klein Moretti in an alternate Victorian era world where he sees a world filled with machinery, cannons, dreadnoughts, airships, difference machines, as well as Potions, Divination, Hexes, Tarot Cards, Sealed Artifacts…  
  
The Light continues to shine but mystery has never gone far. Follow Klein as he finds himself entangled with the Churches of the world—both orthodox and unorthodox—while he slowly develops newfound powers thanks to the Beyonder potions.  
  
Like the corresponding tarot card, The Fool, which is numbered 0—a number of unlimited potential—this is the legend of "The Fool."
description.ru: После переселения в мир пара и машин, главный герой Клейн Моретти все больше запутывается в своем путешествии по этому странному сверхъестественному миру, желая найти путь назад. В процессе изучения магической медицины, гадания, запечатанных предметов, всего сверхъестесственного и отбиваясь от всякой чертовщины, он случайно создал легенду о "Шуте"!

title.en: Uso Kareshi Demo Ii Kara Tonikaku Shitai Mashiro-chan

altTitles.en: Mashiro-chan Wants to Do It Even If It's with a Fake Boyfriend

description.en:
Mashiro Naomoto wants to have a taste of romance and even get to try lewd things, now that she has become a high school student.

However, she has low self-esteem and as a result of lacking confidence in herself, she began to think that it's probably impossible for her. Right at that moment, to her surprise a handsome male classmate named Oosagi-kun confesses to her. Mashiro starts to suspect that his confession must be some sort of punishment game, but her own desire to do lewd stuff wins over it and as a result, she does the opposite and makes a move on him... it's a case of sexual desire winning over suspicion?!

This is a romcom where a high school girl's libido will run wild!!

(Source: Comic-Meteor)

---

* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekomattaaaaan/status/1851462156996551019) (Preview) *Posted with the caption: Doushitemo Sukebe Shitai JK no Manga Kakimashita (どうしてもスケベしたいJKの漫画描きました) "I drew a manga about a high school girl who wants to do perverted stuff no matter what"*
description.ja: 高校生になったのだから恋愛、さらにはＨなことをしてみたい直本ましろ。だが、自己肯定感が低く、自分に自信がないため、どうせ無理だろうなと思っていたところ、なんとクラスメートのイケメン男子・大鷺くんから告白される。絶対に罰ゲームだろうと告白に疑心暗鬼になるましろだったが、Ｈなことをしたいという欲求が勝ったため、逆に大鷺くんに迫るが…性欲は疑惑に勝る!?　性欲強めJKの暴走ラブコメディ!!
description.pt-br:
Mashiro Naomoto quer experimentar o romance e até tentar coisas pervertidas, agora que se tornou uma estudante do ensino médio**.

No entanto, ela tem baixa autoestima e, por falta de confiança em si mesma, começou a pensar que isso provavelmente seria impossível para ela. Nesse momento, para sua surpresa, um colega bonito chamado Oosagi-kun se declara para ela. Mashiro começa a suspeitar que a confissão dele seja algum tipo de jogo de punição, mas seu próprio desejo de fazer coisas pervertidas fala mais alto, e, como resultado, ela toma a iniciativa com ele... seria esse um caso de desejo sexual vencendo a desconfiança?!

Essa é uma comédia romântica onde a libido de uma garota do ensino médio vai correr solta!!

title.en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.ja: つれないほど青くて あざといくらいに赤い

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.es-la: Tan frío como el azul y tan agresivo como el rojo

altTitles.vi: Xanh đến nỗi Lạnh Lùng, Đỏ tới mức Xảo Quyệt

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ja: 覗いてはいけない、だから、覗きたい。　この先輩は…女性？　男性？　中性？　魔性??　好奇心という不治の病を患う転校生が出会ったのは、美しく、可愛らしく、格好よく、恐ろしい、謎の存在（ヒト）だった。
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

title.en: haike, arashi hini saku hana tachie

altTitles.ja: 拝啓、在りし日に咲く花たちへ

title.en: Iinazuke ga Dekita to Omottara, Sono Iinazuke ga Gakkou de Yuumei na "Akuyaku Reijou" Dattan dakedo, Dou Sureba Ii?

altTitles.ja: 許嫁が出来たと思ったら、その許嫁が学校で有名な『悪役令嬢』だったんだけど、どうすればいい？

altTitles.ja-ro: Iinazuke ga Dekita to Omottara, Sono Iinazuke ga Gakkou de Yuumei na "Akuyaku Reijou" datta n dakedo, Dou Sureba Ii?

altTitles.en: It Turns Out That I Have a Fiancée, but She Is the Famous "Villainess" of the School. What Should I Do?

altTitles.pt-br: Acontece que eu tenho uma noiva, mas ela é a famosa "vilã" da escola. O que devo fazer?

description.en:
"I have a fiancée...?"

One day, Higashi Kujou Hiroyuki, an ordinary high school student, is told a surprising fact by his father about an arranged engagement.

His fiancée is Kiryu Ayane, the "Villainess" at school, known to everyone for her sharp tongue and coldhearted personality. 

A heartwarming love story of two high school students that melts the icy heart of a "Villainess" begins!
description.ja:
許嫁がいる……ある日、父から驚きの事実を聞かされた普通の高校生・東九条浩之。
その許嫁とは、学園の誰もが知る、クールでドライな“悪役令嬢”・桐生彩音だった!?

悪役令嬢の氷の心を溶かす、高校生たちの胸あつく少しせつない恋愛ストーリー――！
description.pt-br:
"Eu tenho uma noiva...?"

Um dia, Higashi Kujou Hiroyuki, um estudante comum do ensino médio, ouve um fato surpreendente de seu pai sobre um noivado arranjado.

Sua noiva é Kiryuu Ayane, a "Vilã" da escola, conhecida por todos por sua língua afiada e personalidade fria.

Uma história de amor comovente de dois estudantes do ensino médio que derrete o coração gelado de uma "Vilã" começa!

altTitles.es-la: La chica hiena está destrás de mi.

altTitles.ja: ハイエナちゃんに狙われて

description.en: I found out that my long-distance girlfriend had gotten a new older boyfriend from the city and while I was in the grip of despair, a girl named Haibara Enako, more affectionately called "Hyena-chan" suddenly appeared before me and confessed, "I don't have a boyfriend and I'm free right now."
description.tr: Uzak mesafe kız arkadaşımın şehirden yaşça büyük yeni biriyle sevgili olduğunu öğrendim ve ben umutsuzluğun pençesindeyken Haibara Enako adında, diğer adıyla "Hyena-chan" olarak anılan bir kız aniden karşıma çıktı ve bana açıldı, " Erkek arkadaşım yok ve şu anda boşum."
description.pt-br: Após um término de namoro recente, nosso protagonista é abordado por Enako Haibara, também conhecida como “Hiena”…

altTitles.ja: 海辺のキュー

description.en:
"Why won't this city get destroyed…"   
Chiho, a middle school girl teased for not having a smartphone goes to the seaside to vent her anger, there she meets the strange creature, Q!! Chiho takes a liking to Q, who feeds off human's negative emotions, then decides to secretly bring back and adopt Q, what mysteries does Q hold…?   
Thus begins, in the port city of Numazu, the "invader life" of Chiho and Q.

altTitles.ja: コハエースこれくしょん
コハこれ

description.en:
We're ready to activate Super Dogeza toward basically everybody!

A collection of works by the popular manga artist of Koha-Ace, Keikenchi, has finally arrived. Included in this volume are the ultra-rare collaborations with Prisma Illya, Kantai Collection and Lucky☆Star! It's a volume that's sure to get you hooked on the world of Keikenchi! (Koha-Ace side-story collection, released between Koha-Ace EX and Koha-Ace XP)

altTitles.ja: 公爵様、悪妻の私はもう放っておいてください

description.en:
“Will you stay with me until morning again…!?”

While I thought I had been reincarnated as the wicked wife, why is he looking at me with such love?
One day, I found myself becoming Ilze, the villainous character in a novel I had read before. Ilze is the wife who tries to disrupt the relationship between the protagonist, Gilbert, and the heroine, and her tragic fate ends with her falling into a brothel.

To avoid this dreadful fate, Ilze decided to peacefully ask Gilbert for a divorce. She thought that if she could change the ending, she might be able to enjoy life in this new world. However, her plans didn’t go as expected, as Gilbert suddenly appears in her room and starts behaving in unpredictable ways.

title.en: Zombie Sekai de Harem wo Tsukurou!

altTitles.ja: ゾンビ世界でハーレムをつくろう!

description.en: The world is on the brink of collapse due to the zombie threat. Meanwhile, I’m living the most thrilling and tantalizing days of my life! A high school boy who loves shogi and gaming discovers a mysterious power he possesses for the first time in this zombie-infested world.
description.ja: 世界は今、ゾンビの脅威で滅びかけている。俺は今、サイコーにエチエチな日々を過ごしている――。将棋とゲームが大好きなオタクな男子高校生が、ゾンビの世界になって初めて自分が持つ”ある力”を知った。

altTitles.ja: 天使だった幼なじみ、再会したらギャルだった

altTitles.ja-ro: Tenshi datta Osananajimi, Saikai Shitara Gyaru datta

altTitles.en: My Angel Childhood Friend was a Gal When We Met Again

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染BIGLOVE

altTitles.pt-br: Minha Amiga de Infância Era um Anjo, Mas Quando Nos Reencontramos, Ela Se Tornou uma Gyaru.

description.en: I once had a childhood friend who was an angel. However, when we met again, several years later, she had become a gyaru. A yuri story between two childhood friends.
description.ja: 天使だった幼なじみ、再会したらギャルだった幼なじみの２人の百合です

description.en: A sweet and happy two year marriage felt like a dream. One day, her husband disappeared without a trace. Han Seoryeong, an ordinary housewife and blind woman, desperately searches for him... “You’ll never find him.” Her husband turned out to be the best secret agent with many faces. “Our marriage was everything to me, but it was just ‘work’ to him?” In the midst of her world crumbling, Seoryeong mistakenly unleashes the madness she had been suppressing.…
description.fr:
Deux années de mariage aussi douces qu’un rêve.
Mais un jour, son mari disparaît sans laisser de trace.

Han Seoryeong, femme au foyer ordinaire et non-voyante, part à sa recherche,
mais la vérité qu’elle découvre dépasse l’imaginable.

Son mari était un agent secret aux cent visages,
et tout ce qu’elle croyait vrai n’était qu’une façade pour son “travail”.

Dévastée par le désespoir, Seoryeong laisse exploser la folie qu’elle avait refoulée.
Si elle ne peut pas le traquer, elle choisira de devenir sa proie !

altTitles.th: อ่านชะตาวันสิ้นโลก

altTitles.ja: 全知的な読者の視点から

altTitles.vi: Góc nhìn của Độc giả Toàn tri

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

title.en: Rebirth in the End Times: I Reached the Top by Opening Boxes

altTitles.zh: 末世重生：我靠开箱子问鼎巅峰

description.en:
Jiang Xiaoyong was betrayed and killed by a green tea girl in the apocalypse, but was accidentally resurrected a year ago and obtained the blind box system. 

He was always one step ahead of others, collecting supplies and spending a fortune to build a safe house before the apocalypse. He became stronger through the system and avenged his enemies in his previous life. 

From then on, he embarked on the road to the king's counterattack.

title.en: I Tried Asking My Cool Girlfriend for a Favor

altTitles.ja-ro: Cool Kanojo ni Onegai Shite Mita

altTitles.ja: クール彼女にお願いしてみた

altTitles.en: I Tried asking a favor to my Cool Girlfriend

altTitles.ro: Am Încercat Să-i Cer o Favoare Iubitei Mele Cool

altTitles.vi: Tôi nhờ cô bạn gái nghiêm túc làm nó vì mình

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

altTitles.ja: ボクラノキセキ

description.en: From a young age, Minami Harusumi has had recurring dreams of Veronica, a princess whose kingdom is on the verge of destruction. He believes them to be recollections of his past life, and that he is her reincarnation. Because of this, he is ridiculed by his classmates. One day, when the mockery escalates into bullying, he rediscovers magic—something Veronica had studied and used. Reassured his past life is not merely a fantasy, Minami tries to learn more about his past memories and the reason behind them…

title.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game as an NPC

altTitles.ko: 망겜 속에 갇혔다 근데 이제 NPC를 곁들인

altTitles.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game, but Now With NPCs
Trapped in a Game That Flopped

description.en:
I'm going to live a normal life!

...said Shari Azriel, the apothecary of the Dover village.

Then one day, I realised that I possessed an NPC in a video game! I've been locked up here for two years, and I only just noticed.

If I can't get out of the game...
"A, in their 20's, was found starved to death while playing VR games."
This could be what I'm remembered as!

"I have to get out!"

However, it was too late when I came to the realisation that... I can't log out because of an error!

That means, the only way out would be approaching the male lead, "the Lord of Nightmares," and helping his comrades defeat the final villain. So I have no choice but to wait until the game ends...

The difficulty level, the story, the likelihood of failure in such a heinous game, a game that nobody won before...

"The Lord of Nightmares has a strong urge to kill you."

Somehow, I believe that dying by the male lead's hands would be faster.

In order to make a living, the vagrant Eastern girl Bai Chun became the "living mannequin" of queen Alice. Planning to make a quick buck and then escape, Chun inadvertently became embroiled in a conspiracy of those vying for power while trying to leave. Can the temporary union of East and West avert disaster? Find out in Chun and Alice~

altTitles.ja: レッドブルー

description.en: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

altTitles.ja: 帰ってください! 阿久津さん

altTitles.zh: 请你回去吧！阿久津同学

altTitles.it: Per favore torna a casa, Akutsu-san!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor vá para casa, Akutsu-san!

altTitles.vi: Cút mẹ về nhà đi Akutsu!

description.en: Ooyama-kun normally doesn't get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place! Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san's sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space... he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn't?
description.it: Ooyama-kun normalmente non si fa coinvolgere da Akutsu-san, una ragazza delinquente della sua classe, ma per qualche motivo lei fa della sua casa il suo luogo di ritrovo!  Ooyama le farà qualcosa di orribile a porte chiuse o la caccerà fuori? Tuttavia aver a che fare con il comportamento sexy e carino di Akutsu-san in uno spazio così ristretto... è sicuro che si ecciterà!  Vuole che lei torni a casa e allo stesso tempo non vuole,  Una commedia stuzzicante sotto lo stesso tetto!
description.ja: 普段は全く関わりのないクラスの不良女子・阿久津さんに何故か家をたまり場にされてしまった一人暮らしの大山くん。ガラの悪い阿久津さんに何かひどいことをされるのではと追い出そうとするのだが、無防備で距離感の近い彼女のエロカワイイ仕草にドギマギしてしまい…？ 帰ってほしいのに、帰ってほしくない!?
description.ru:
Оояма-кун обычно не связывается с Акуцу-сан, девушкой-правонарушителем в его классе, но по каким-то причинам она делает его дом своим тусовочным заведением! Оояма сделает с ней что-нибудь ужасное за закрытыми дверями или он её прогонит? Он хочет, чтобы она пошла домой, но не хочет? Дразнящая комедия под одной крышей!  
  
**Notes:**   
- Yankee Musume (ヤンキー娘) is the pre-serialization name.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/NAGAOKA0)  
- [Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=133935)
description.es-la: Ooyama-kun normalmente no se involucra con Akutsu-san, una chica yankee de su clase, ¡pero por alguna razón ella hace de su casa su lugar de reunión! ¿Ooyama le hará algo horrible cuando estén las puertas cerradas o la echará? Pero lidiar con el sexy y lindo comportamiento de Akutsu en un espacio tan reducido sera un problema…
description.pt-br: Ooyama geralmente não se envolve com com Akutsu-san, uma garota delinquente da sua turma, mas por alguma razão ela transformou o quarto dele no seu local de descanso! Será que ela vai fazer algo horrível para ele ou ele vai expulsar ela? Mas lidar com a sexy e fofa Akutsu-san em um espaço fechado... Ele com certeza vai ficar envergonhado! Ooyama quer que ela vá para casa, mas ele também não quer? Uma comédia provocante sob um mesmo teto!

title.en: The Moon on a Rainy Night

altTitles.ja: 雨夜の月

altTitles.fr: The Moon on a Rainy Night (Meian)

altTitles.pt-br: A Lua em uma Noite Chuvosa

altTitles.es-la: La luna en una noche lluviosa

description.en: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her.
description.ja:
2人の少女の、目には見えないもの、かけがえのないこと。

金田一咲希は高校入学直前のある日、ピアノレッスンに向かう途中で見知らぬ同世代の少女とぶつかり手を擦りむくが、相手から無言のまま真っすぐに見つめられた後、落とした楽譜を丁寧に拾われ絆創膏をもらう。咲希は印象的だったその少女とクラスメイトとして再会し、名前が及川奏音、そして耳が不自由だと知る。学校では障害を理由に周囲と距離を置く奏音に、淋しさを覚えた咲希はどうにか分かり合おうとし、そんな彼女の姿に奏音の態度も次第に変わっていき…。
description.ko: 고등학교에 입학한 사키와 귀가 불편한 반 친구 카논. 사람들과 거리를 두는 카논이 안고 있는 것과 겉으론 보이지 않는 것. 그것을 알고자 하는 사키에게 카논도 점차···. 두 소녀의 눈에는 보이지 않는 것, 둘도 없이 소중한 것.
description.pt-br: Um dia, pouco antes de entrar no colégio, Kazuki Kaneda colide com uma garota estranha da mesma geração a caminho da aula de piano e machuca sua mão, mas a partitura que caiu silenciosamente, da outra parte é cuidadosamente recolhida e um curativo é recebido. Saki se reúne com a garota impressionante como colega de classe e descobre que seu nome é Oikawa Kanon e ela é surda. Na escola, Saki, que estava sozinha, tentou entender o som de Kanon, que manteve distância do ambiente por causa de sua deficiência, e sua atitude mudou gradualmente.
